resources.string: Google telah resmi mengumumkan brand ponsel "Pixel" yang telah lama dinanti-nanti; yaitu "Pixel" dan "Pixel XL", pada 8 Oktober. Kita menghadiri Google London UK mirroring the main one taking place in San Francisco, US, where the firm unwrapped the new Android 7.1 Nougat devices which will apparently usurp Googleâ€™s long-standing Nexus series

2,770 mAh battery
 Standby time (LTE): up to 19 days
 Talk time (3g/WCDMA): up to 26 hours
 Internet use time (Wi-Fi): up to 13 hours
 Internet use time (LTE): up to 13 hours
 Video playback: up to 13 hours
 Audio playback (via headset): up to 110 hours
 Fast charging: up to 7 hours of use from only 15 minutes of charging
